# @param {Integer[]} max_heights
# @return {Integer}
def maximum_sum_of_heights(max_heights)
    n = max_heights.length
    max_sum = 0

    # Iterate through each index as potential peak
    (0...n).each do |peak|
        left = [1] * peak
        right = [1] * (n - peak - 1)

        # Calculate maximum possible heights to the left of the peak
        (1...peak).each do |i|
            left[i] = [left[i-1], max_heights[i]].min
        end

        # Calculate maximum possible heights to the right of the peak
        (n-2).downto(peak+1).each do |i|
            right[i-peak-1] = [right[i-peak], max_heights[i]].min
        end

        # Compute the sum of heights for this configuration
        sum = left.sum + right.sum + max_heights[peak]

        # Update max_sum if this sum is greater
        max_sum = [max_sum, sum].max
    end

    max_sum
end
